title: Will Vingegaard and Van Aert Be at the Tour de France? Big Hints Emerge from Team Training Camp
content:
Photo out of Visma-Lease a Bike pre-Tour camp on Tignes suggests team is close to finalizing a final eight after season studded by injury disasters.

Read the full article at Will Vingegaard and Van Aert Be at the Tour de France? Big Hints Emerge from Team Training Camp on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
